messages.subject: Re: our trip down to SC/Chicago
messages.msgSnippet: ... right?   They must have a good bus system. ... But it sounds like around downtown it would be easy too. ... Yeah, public busses are good, and they also
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "Kelli Traaseth"
<tktraas@p...> wrote:
> **town bus pass and
> visit museums,**
>
>
> It sounds like I don't have to worry about driving downtown then,
right? They must have a good bus system.
>
> I mean I know the L is there, I think that's what its called.
But it sounds like around downtown it would be easy too.
>
>
> Kelli~


Yeah, public busses are good, and they also have the double decker
tourist buses that you can buy an allday pass for. I think we have
done both.

ang

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: our trip down to SC/Chicago
messages.msgSnippet: **town bus pass and visit museums,** It sounds like I don t have to worry about driving downtown then,  right?   They must have a good bus system. I mean I
messages.messageBody:
**town bus pass and
visit museums,**


It sounds like I don't have to worry about driving downtown then, right? They must have a good bus system.

I mean I know the L is there, I think that's what its called. But it sounds like around downtown it would be easy too.


Kelli~
